body:
Hi Justin,

This sounds like a bug! Thanks for reporting. Have you checked the idf files to see if Honeybee OpenStudio exports Windows materials correctly?

I'll be quite busy until later this week but added this to [github](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/503) so I or one of the other developers check this ASAP.

Thank you so much for reporting!

Mostapha
